11.content: You look at your arms and they start to freak out a little bit as you notice you dont have hands! Your arms are a different color than normal as well. You see something shiny in the jungle ( piece of glass) and walk up to see your reflection. Your a ...

choices: You see the way to the apartment
111.content: The feeling is overwhelming at first, then you think this could be fun. Multiple legs and super strength. You easily lift a pebble twice your size. Trying out your new body you climb a blade of grass to get a better view...
111.title: Ant

113.content: Your sense of smell has increased dramatically, you spin around in disbelief. Definalty have wings. More legs and small hairs. Big eyes. Yep I'm a fly. Trying to make the best of it you attempt to fly. After a few attempts and crashing, up you go. Now you can see where you are. The community garden! Flying is pretty sweet, but then someone is coming.
113.title: Fly

choices: Figure out exactly where you are
12.content: You walk around for a few minutes then come to a familiar landmark. It's a coke can...except its gigantic. You start to panic thinking you must be in a dream and pinch yourself. After taking a deep breath you realize you must be about 1/4 of an inch tall. You make a plan to...
12.title: That your shrunk

123.content:
You see a group of people walking towards your location you notice there are 5 girls, 2 young girls (ages 8 and 10), 1 teen girl looks around 17, and 2 adults who look to be around their mid 20's. All 5 of them are blonde. By the time you finish thinking all this you look up and they are almost in front of you.

Who gets to you first?
123.title: Someone comes

choices: Drops a bag next to you.

1232.title: The teen arrives...

12324.content:
She drops a bag next to you without even looking and she stood there talking to the other girls, nows your chance. Either jump into the bag or run away and stay in this huge outdoors place.


What will it be?
12324.title: Drops a bag next to you.

choices: Nothing happens and you try again.
123241.content: You decide to jump into the bag this teen girl droped next to you, as you start to climb it the wind picks up blowing you back down to the bottom of it. You try again buy this time the wind blows stronger and you fly farther back from the bag. You start to get up on your feet to try 1 last time when....
123241.title: Bag time!

choices: Did nothing. She wasn't looking at you.
1232412.content: Once you finaly get back to your feet you take 1 steep towards the bag to try 1 last time, when suddenly the wind blows so hard one of the younger girls falls over and hits the bag tipping it on to its side, the young girl pauses looking right at you before she stands up she....
1232412.title: Timber!

12324122.content:
The young girl stands back up and continues to talk to the others, you sigh in huge relief that she didn't see you. Who knows what she would do if she saw you. You quickly snap out of it and run back to the now tipped bag. After what felt like 2 hours (accualy 2 mins) you finally reached the bag again. Suddenly you notice the bag start to be lifted up into the air as the teen girl was done talking and was getting ready to leave. You quickly make a running jump towards the bag to try to get inside it.

Do you make it?
12324122.title: Unnoticed so far.

choices: The hand grabs what ever your glued onto.
The hand grabs something else leaving you alone.
123241221.content:
You take a running jump towards the bag as your last chance to get inside it and you made it! You land on the bottom of this teen girls bag to be suddenly tossed around with each slow and gentle movement this teen girl made. This goes on for a few minutes when with a hard tip of her bag you are thrown aganst something sticky when you tried to move you found yourself unable to move your body at all. Like you were glued to this unknown object. Suddenly the bag opens and a hand reaches in...

What happens?
123241221.title: Success!!!

choices: The object your stuck to is taken out along with you.
1232412212.content:
You watch in horror as this giant hand reaches into this bag coming at you but grabs the object nect to you as the hand lifts up you see that it grabed a nail file shortly after the hand left you see as the nail file is plunged back into the bag (it was droped in) you scream in fear of being impaled by it, when it came closer to you, you leaned as far foward as you could and the file landed right aganst your back and the object your stuck to the bag then closes and your left in darkness again. But this time each movement of the bag pushed the file deeper into what was keeping you stuck to this unknown object. After a few more minutes the file is almost fully threw cutting you free when suddenly the bag opens...

What happens?
1232412212.title: Spared this time.

choices: The cash that was just put inside?
12324122122.content:
You are blinded by the light as the bag is opened, you see paper falling down inside as the bag is closed again. You noticed it was money before the light was cut off. Then suddenly the movement started again and the 3rd jounce of the bag forced the nail file fully threw and freed you, you fall back to the bottom but this time landed on something soft and flat...

What did you land on?
12324122122.title: Something is droped inside.

123241221222.content: How about a piece of clothing?
123241221222.title: Clothing?

1232412212221.content: Does this piece of clothing belong to this teen girl is it for someone else?
1232412212221.title: Yes

12324122122211.content: The bag opens up and you look and see a ceiling fan then quickly relize your in this teen girls bedroom. You quickly look down at what you landed on and see its this teen girls....
12324122122211.title: Clothing of a teen girl...

123241221222111.content: Are they clean or dirty?
123241221222111.title: Panties

1232412212221111.content:
The giantess teen girl reaches into the bag and grabs the dirty panties you are on top of as she grabs it she balls it up into her hand reaping you in the middle of the wad of panties. She then pulls it out fully and drops it into a soft pile as the panties unfold you notice she droped the panties (and you) in a clothes hamper. There is no lid for this kind of hamper you thank God for that. After about 10mins of being traped in her hamper with all her dirty underwear you see her bedroom light turn off and hear her bed squeak a few times before it stoped you think that maybe she's asleep and nows your chance to get out of this hamper. You climb the hamper to the top and stand on the rim and look around and when you look behind you there is a mirror and you finally get to see how tall you are when you relize your about 1/4 of an inch you freak out and fall off the rim of the hamper....

What end did you fall off?
1232412212221111.title: Dirty pile

12324122122211221.title: Socks

12324122122211222.content: Is it her skirt or pants?

1232412212221122221.content: Is it clean or dirty?
1232412212221122221.title: Her shirt

1232412212222.content: Is it this teen girls maxi pad?
1232412212222.title: Pad?

choices: Someone's shoe (teen girl or someone else)
123241222.content:
You make a running jump to try to get inside the bag while you still had a chance but sadly you missed and fell off the platform you were on and plumited down into a dark place with a small round opening for light to seep in from. You wonder where you landed but before you could think of possible places you look up only to see you answer coming right at you.

Where are you?
123241222.title: Missed...

choices: There is something in the bushes
13.content: It's hot and humid as the sun beats down in the dense foliage. It's time to move and hopefully figure out where you are. You're not incompetent and can use the sun to try and stay on track. After an hour, you are starting the wear down, it's odd that you haven't seen any animals or birds. Then you see something odd. It looks like a cucumber but its huge, the size of a bus. Confused you sit down to try and figure out what's really going on. Just then...
13.title: Dont realize what's going on and explore

131.content:
The ground starts to shake hard. You think its a bad earthquake but you look up to the bus size cucumber and see its not shaking then from above something droped down almost hitting you in the head. You turn around and see its a huge mirror and you quickly rub your eyes hoping what you saw isn't real... You do this a few more times before you finaly accept that what you see ion the mirror is that your tiny around an inch tall. You look back to the cucumber and quickly freak out thinking that it is normal size and if a person can eat it with little to no effort what could they do to you?! You start to run away when suddenly the ground starts to shake again....

What happens?
131.title: The ground shakes

choices: Wake up, the sun is fully out and it's hot
14.content: Looking around your completely lost. You remember watching a survival show that says to stay put if you get lost and you have better chances of being found. You try to put together a small shelter and sit down to wait. It's kind of a relaxing area, lots of green trees that look funny. You start to drift off as you lay down...
14.title: Dont realize and stay put

141.content: You jump awake as the ground starts to shake violently you look up and freak out you see huge people walking past and one stops next to where you are and starts to sit down. When this giant person sits down something falls from their bag and lands infront of your make-shift shelter. You slowly look out and up to this huge person and see its a giantess girl who looks to be around 17 years old or so. You then look down at when droped out of her bag and relize its a(n)....
141.title: The ground is rumbling

choices: Did i hit the side of the flower box
I hit the stalk of a flower and slid down
142.content:
I'm not sure what exactly woke me, but I became aware of the heat and humidity, then was startled wide awake when I realized I was not in my bed or recliner in front of the tv. Oh, I was lost! How could I have forgotten? I sat up and remembered propping this leaf up with a thin stick to create a shelter. My mouth felt like cotton. How long had it been since I had a drink? I couldn't remember.

Nothing here looked familiar. I was lost in a lush, overgrown jungle of sorts. Everything was huge! Was this how Alice felt after she drank the potion? It took a little practice to get used to walking with so many legs. My wings had dried out while I napped and I gave them an experimental flap. Oohh, that was a cool sensation! I wondered if I could fly? Maybe if I could fly up to a higher place, I could get a better look at where I was.

After making sure I was steady, I started flapping my wings, harder and harder. Then, yes...my feet started leaving the ground! I never liked heights much and was scared to go too high and already I was feeling out of control. Boy, flapping one's wings takes a LOT of energy! I was already starting to weaken and tire.

I spotted what looked like a flower box and aimed in that direction. For some reason, the flowers looked so much brighter and I could smell them with greater intensity than I used to. I eased back on my flapping and started to descend, but I was still going a little too fast and I started to panic! I felt for sure I was about to crash land! But there were only a few limited options of where I could crash.
142.title: Wake up, the sun is fully out and it's hot

1422.content:
As i freak out I crash land by hitting a of a flower then I slid to the bottom and walked out onto the platform in the clearing (The concrete edge, normal people use it to sit and relax and or set things down for a moment.) As i get to the clearing to see where i landed the sky started to get darker and darker. I look up and see....

What did I see?
1422.title: I hit the stalk of a flower and slid down

choices: A flower pot in someone's hands
1423.title: More crash landing spots

15.content:
You notice that right now you are verry small and when you really want to be normal size you suddenly grow to normal. Does this mean you can change your size at will? 'WOOT POWERS!' you think loudly to yourself and start to plot on how to use this new gift!


Or does this not happen?
15.title: Powers?

info.brief_description: You shrink in the only city garden(GP!)
info.description:
The story is based in a community garden in a big city, the kids come here to pick veggies with their parents or friends, people come to hangout, everyone in town likes this place! It's the only green area for blocks.

You are in your 20s and have an apartment nearby. You either shrink to an inch or less or transform into type of bug in the garden.

Anything goes except male interactions. Gp for good additions and I will add to your interactive story! Let's make this big!

Thanks to those who have added
